title: Mike Gravel
summary: Maurice Robert Gravel (/ɡrəˈvɛl/ grə-VEL; May 13, 1930 – June 26, 2021) was an American politician who served as a United States Senator from Alaska from 1969 to 1981 as a member of the Democratic Party, and who, in later life, twice ran for the presidential nomination of that party.
